properties.areaDesc: Hawk Channel from Ocean Reef to Craig Key out to the reef; Straits of Florida from Craig Key to west end of Seven Mile Bridge out 20 NM; Straits of Florida from Craig Key to west end of Seven Mile Bridge 20 to 60 NM out; Hawk Channel from Craig Key to west end of Seven Mile Bridge out to the reef; Bayside and Gulf side from Craig Key to West End of Seven Mile Bridge; Florida Bay including Barnes Sound, Blackwater Sound, and Buttonwood Sound; Straits of Florida from west end of Seven Mile Bridge to south of Halfmoon Shoal out 20 NM; Straits of Florida from Ocean Reef to Craig Key 20 to 60 NM out; Straits of Florida from west end of Seven Mile Bridge to south of Halfmoon Shoal 20 to 60 NM out; Straits of Florida from Ocean Reef to Craig Key out 20 NM
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 4 at 6:52PM EST by NWS Key West FL
properties.description:
The areas affected include...
Hawk Channel and Straits of Florida from Ocean Reef to west end of
Seven Mile Bridge out 60 nm...
Straits of Florida from west end of Seven Mile Bridge to Halfmoon
Shoal out 60 nm...
Bayside and Gulf side from Craig Key to west end of Seven Mile
Bridge...
Florida Bay including Barnes Sound, Blackwater Sound, and Buttonwood
Sound...

At 643 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists detected a
front, capable of producing wind gusts near 30 knots. This front was
located from near Angelfish Key to near Marathon Humps to 43 nm
south of Wood's Wall West Crack, moving east at 25 knots.

Locations impacted include...
Buttonwood Sound, Mosquito Bank Light, Tavernier Creek, Tennessee
Reef Light, French Ref, Grecian Rocks and Cotton Key.

Prepare for squalls with wind gusts near 30 knots, locally rough and
confused seas.
